title: EWC - Signatory Rights
description: Schema for Signatory Rights -  EWC WP3

credential_subject.description: Attributes describing the legal representation of a legal entity

legal_person_name.description: Official current legal person name as registered in the business register.

legal_person_id.description: Unique id for organisations in EUID structure

signatory_rights.description: Information about the person and its signatory right about the legal entity

credential_status.description: Defines suspension and/or revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by the type extension

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status

credential_schema.description: One or more schemas that validate the Verifiable Credential.
Contains information about the credential schema on which the issued credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema stored on the Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based on

signatory_rights.held_by_person.description: Details about the signatory of the company and his right if incarnated by a physical person

full_name.description: Full name of the physical person representing the company

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the physical person representing the company

nationality.description: Nationality of the physical person representing the company

signatory_rule.description: Information if the signatory can engage the company alone or jointly

code.description: National code of the post of the person

name.description: Name of the post of the person as registered
